mapper.select: select count(tu.id) as total from tb_psct_code tpc , tb_user tu where tpc.stff_id = #{id} and tpc.inst_id = #{instId} and tpc.psct_code = tu.psct_code and tpc.uid = tu.uid and tpc.name=tu.name

select tu.id, tu.uid, tu.name, tu.psct_code as psctCode, tu.terms_agree as termsAgree, tu.status, tu.profile_img as profileImage, tu.training_path as trainingPath, tu.app_guide_yn as appGuideYN from tb_psct_code tpc , tb_user tu where tpc.stff_id = #{id} and tpc.inst_id = #{instId} and tpc.psct_code = tu.psct_code order by tpc.id ASC limit 4 offset #{startOffset};
